<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106827</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106827</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202769</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Escapes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entgeht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">S'échappe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escapa-se</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fuoriesce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαφυγές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Se escapa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson will help students become more understanding of cultural differences. Students will analyze the theme of escape in two poems. They will recognize and record literary elements found in the poems and connect the poems to life in a meaningful way.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Lektionwille helfen Kursteilnehmern, mehr 
Verständnis der kulturellen Unterschiede zu werden. 
Kursteilnehmer analysieren das Thema des Entweichens in zwei 
Gedichten. Sie erkennen und speichern die literarischen 
Elemente, die in den Gedichten gefunden werden und schließen die 
Gedichte an das Leben in einer aussagefähigen Methode an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette volonté de leçon aident des étudiants à 
devenir plus d'arrangement des différences culturelles. Les 
étudiants analyseront le thème de l'évasion en deux poésies. 
Ils identifieront et enregistreront les éléments littéraires 
trouvés dans les poésies et relieront les poésies à la vie d'une 
voie signicative.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta vontade da lição ajuda a estudantes 
transformar-se mais compreensão de diferenças cultural. Os 
estudantes analisarão o tema do escape em dois poemas. 
Reconhecerão e gravarão os elementos literários encontrados 
nos poemas e conectarão os poemas à vida em uma maneira 
significativa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa volontà di lezione aiuta gli allievi a 
transformarsi in in più comprensione delle differenze culturali. 
Gli allievi analizzeranno il tema della fuga in due poems. 
Riconosceranno e registreranno gli elementi letterari trovati 
nei poems e collegheranno i poems a vita in un modo espressivo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα θα βοηθήσει τους σπουδαστές να γίνουν 
κατανόηση των πολιτιστικών διαφορών. Οι σπουδαστές θα 
αναλύσουν το θέμα της διαφυγής σε δύο ποιήματα. Θα 
αναγνωρίσουν και θα καταγράψουν τα λογοτεχνικά στοιχεία που 
βρίσκονται στα ποιήματα και θα συνδέσουν τα ποιήματα με τη ζωή με
έναν σημαντικό τρόπο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta voluntad de la lección ayuda a estudiantes a
convertirse en más comprensión de diferencias culturales. Los 
estudiantes analizarán el tema del escape en dos poemas. 
Reconocerán y registrarán los elementos literarios encontrados
en los poemas y conectarán los poemas con la vida de una manera 
significativa.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>

              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
